summary: Matilda the Shieldmaiden, defender of Whiterun and made famous in a popular balad...
descriptionHtml:
Aww, c\'mon, someone had to do it.  Gritty female Nord - Complete with steel armor and weapons. 

To get the same look as I have here you need: 
DIMONIZED UNP female body - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13407
Bodyslide - bodysize sliders for UNP http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13407
Sporty Sexy Map - Athletic muscle mod CBBE UNP ADEC by Xs2reality http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13377
If you want her to have the Brutal Steel Armor as pictured you will need Immersive Armors by hothtrooper44 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733

There once was a hero named Ragnar the Red, who came riding to Whiterun from ole Rorikstead!
And the braggart did swagger and brandish his blade, as he told of bold battles and gold he had made!
But then he went quiet, did Ragnar the Red, when he met the shieldmaiden Matilda who said…
Oh, you talk and you lie and you drink all our mead! Now I think it’s high time that you lie down and bleed!
And so then came the clashing and slashing of steel, as the brave lass Matilda charged in full of zeal!
And the braggart named Ragnar was boastful no moooooree… when his ugly red head rolled around on the floor!
author: Drewcat
